title: The Ravenous Wolf Devours The Cocoon
alternative_title: Kyourou wa Mayu wo Hamu ; 狂狼は繭を喰む
status: Kyourou wa Mayu wo Hamu ; 狂狼は繭を喰む
description:
Description :
        Kinuhime, the daughter of Yakuza Boss, is to be married as an offering for the merger with a rival group. She had lost sight the meaning of life, when meets Shian, the strongest and most ferocious guard like a beast, and begins to shape her own destiny?!
